jp.go.enri.prml.vb

Class NDEVB

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.go.enri.prml.vb.NDEVB

  • public class NDEVB
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameter estimation of the mixture distribution by means of the variational Bayesian method.
    Version:
    1.0.1 (Last update: 30/11/2011)
    Author:
    Masato Fujita (Electronic Navigation Research Institute)

      • threshold

        public static double threshold
        Very small number. Computation is terminated when the lower bound is smaller than this value.

         double[] data,

        data - data matrix(IN)

      • Mstep

        void Mstep(NDEParameterDistribution initial_param,
         double[] data,
         double[][] r,
         double[] Nk,
         NDEParameterDistribution param)
        M-step
        Parameters:
        initial_param - Prior distribution(IN)
        data - data matrix(IN)
        r - The variable `r'(IN)
        Nk - \sum_{i=1}^N r_{i,k}(OUT)
        param - Parameter distribution(OUT)

      • lowerbound

        double lowerbound(NDEParameterDistribution initial_param,
                NDEParameterDistribution param,
                double[][] r,
                double[] Nk)
        Compute the lower bound.
        Parameters:
        initial_param - Prior distribution(IN)
        r - The values of the parameter `r'(IN)
        Nk - \sum_{i=1}^N r_{i,k}(IN)
        param - Parameter distribution(IN)
        Returns:
        Lower bound
